mapper.select: SELECT A.PROC_ID, A.PROC_NM, A.DESCRIPTION, A.SCENARIO_ID, B.SCENARIO_NM, A.PORTFOLIO_ID, C.PORTFOLIO_NM, A.CRTN_TIME FROM PROCESS_INFO A, SCENARIO_INFO B, PORTFOLIO_INFO C WHERE A.SCENARIO_ID = B.SCENARIO_ID AND A.PORTFOLIO_ID = C.PORTFOLIO_ID

SELECT A.PROC_ID, A.PROC_NM, A.DESCRIPTION, A.SCENARIO_ID, B.SCENARIO_NM, A.PORTFOLIO_ID, C.PORTFOLIO_NM, A.CRTN_TIME FROM PROCESS_INFO A, SCENARIO_INFO B, PORTFOLIO_INFO C WHERE A.SCENARIO_ID = B.SCENARIO_ID AND A.PORTFOLIO_ID = C.PORTFOLIO_ID AND A.PROC_ID = #{procId}
SELECT MAX(PROC_ID) + 1 AS MAX_PROC_ID FROM PROCESS_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROCESS_INFO (PROC_ID, SCENARIO_ID, PORTFOLIO_ID, PROC_NM, DESCRIPTION, CRTN_TIME) VALUES( #{procId}, #{scenarioId}, #{portfolioId}, #{procNM}, #{description}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PROCESS_INFO SET SCENARIO_ID = #{scenarioId}, PORTFOLIO_ID = #{portfolioId}, PROC_NM = #{procNM}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, CRTN_TIME = now() WHERE PROC_ID = #{procId}
